body:
Comment 5: 
Using C:\Go\bin\gotour.exe should work too. If you build and install it with

C:\a\code\src\code.google.com\p\go-tour\gotour>go install

command. Please note, my GOPATH=C:\a\code, so my gotour.exe will end up in
C:\a\code\bin\gotour.exe. Is it similar with you? Maybe you are running wrong
gotour.exe, and it is out of date.

Alex
_Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
